end

		type market trader
	}

		type hinterland_farms farms
	}

		type hinterland_roads roads
	}
}

faction_relationships		germans,		-600		egypt

faction_relationships		germans,		600		slave

faction_relationships		dacia,			-600		parthia
faction_relationships		dacia,			-600		gauls
faction_relationships		dacia,			-600		germans
faction_relationships		dacia,			-600		scythia
faction_relationships		dacia,			-600		egypt
faction_relationships		dacia,			600		macedon
faction_relationships		dacia,			600		slave

faction_relationships		scythia,		-600		parthia
faction_relationships		scythia,		-600		gauls
faction_relationships		scythia,		-600		germans
faction_relationships		scythia,		-600		dacia
faction_relationships		scythia,		-600		egypt
faction_relationships		scythia,		600		macedon
faction_relationships		scythia,		600		slave

faction_relationships		slave,			600		scythia
faction_relationships		slave,			600		macedon
faction_relationships		slave,			600		parthia
faction_relationships		slave,			600		gauls
faction_relationships		slave,			600		germans
faction_relationships		slave,			600		dacia
faction_relationships		slave,			600		egypt
